item.title: Turbo Frames in Ruby on Rails: Building Modal Windows Without JavaScript
item.description:
Turbo Frames in Ruby on Rails: Building Modal Windows Without JavaScript

Turbo Frames is a powerful feature of Hotwire that allows you to create dynamic, interactive interfaces in Ruby on Rails without writing JavaScript code. In this guide, we’ll build a complete example of a modal window for creating posts.

What are Turbo Frames?
